Hobbies

Playing the piano


I’m a member of Xi’an Jiaotong University Piano Salon, and I’ve be playing piano for years since I was a child! I love it! Here are some photos of me from the concerts we held.


A video of me playing Beethoven’s Sonata No. 8 in C Minor, Op. 13, “Pathétique”: II. Adagio cantabile can be found here

Singing


Here are some photos from our class concert. I started learning to sing when I was in my last year of high school, and I’ve kept taking singing classes during my undergraduate time. I really love it!

Composing


I’m also a composing lover! Creating music is cool for me! Here is a piece of music score of a trio recomposed by me from A Thousand Years, inspired by the video here. If you also happen to love music, the full score is here free for you. You are always welcome to play it!
